downloadTitle: Common Criteria Supplemental Admin Guidance for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2
downloadDescription: This is the supplemental administrator guidance documentation that was used in the Common Criteria evaluation of Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2.

detailsSection: The Common Criteria Supplemental Admin Guidance document describes how to setup Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 to meet the same security conditions used by the Common Criteria (CC) evaluation. It supplements the Windows 7 Security Guide and Windows Server 2008 R2 Security Guide published by Microsoft. These guides are available in the Microsoft Security Compliance Manager (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=113939). The Common Criteria Supplemental Admin Guidance for Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2 is primarily for IT professionals, security specialists, network architects, computer engineers, and other IT consultants who plan application or infrastructure development and deployments of Windows Server 2008 R2 for servers in an enterprise environment. It is not intended for home users.

installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button on this page to start the download.
2. Do one of the following:
a. To read the file immediately, click the Open button.
b. To copy the file to your computer for later use, click the Save button.
